scripts.dev: corepack pnpm --filter @equivalentes/shared build && tsx watch src/index.ts
scripts.build: corepack pnpm --filter @equivalentes/shared build && prisma generate --schema prisma/schema.prisma && tsc -p tsconfig.json
scripts.prisma:baseline: prisma db execute --schema prisma/schema.prisma --file prisma/migrations/20260212120000_init/migration.sql && (prisma migrate resolve --schema prisma/schema.prisma --applied 20260212120000_init || echo baseline already applied)
scripts.db:setup: corepack pnpm prisma:baseline && corepack pnpm prisma:migrate && corepack pnpm prisma:seed
